title: Stephen A. is disgusted by the Steelers' loss to the Browns | First Take
author: ESPN
description:
Stephen A. Smith and Max Kellerman react to the Cleveland Browns securing their first playoff win since 1994 after defeating the Pittsburgh Steelers 48-37.
#FirstTake #NFL
